Series.Actors: |Zachary Levi|Yvonne Strahovski|Joshua Gomez|Adam Baldwin|Bonita Friedericy|Julia Ling|Vik Sahay|Ryan McPartlin|Scott Krinsky|Mark Christopher Lawrence|Sarah Lancaster|Mekenna Melvin|Linda Hamilton|Brandon Routh|Matthew Bomer|
Series.Overview: Chuck Bartowski, ace computer geek at Buy More, is not in his right mind. That's a good thing. Ever since he unwittingly downloaded stolen government secrets into his brain, action, excitement and a cool secret-agent girlfriend have entered his life. It's a bad thing, too. Because now Chuck is in danger 24/7.
